spanGrp.span: I speak Urum and Russian languages well.
urum dilidä yahši bülierım da urus dilidä yahši bülierım
I know Russian because I was studying in Russian school.
urus dili bülierım onučun ki urus školada ohierdım
We speak Urum language as because we learned it and speak it at home.
bizım dilida bülierın onučun ki ävdä söilierıh ävdä örgä örgändıh bu dili söilämäh
I speak both of languages well.
I can write in Urum and in Russian as well.
bizım diljäda yazmah bülierım urus diljada yahši yazmah bülierım
Sometimes there are some words that are hard to say in Urum, but I can say it in Russian.
inagda elä sözlär var bizım di diljä oki ğanmierım ee diamierım urus dilınän dierım
